verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We bow our hearts,
We bend our knees,
Holy Spirit, come make us humble;
We turn our eyes from evil things,
Lord, we cast down our idols.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give us clean hands,
Give us pure hearts,
Let us not lift our souls to another,
Let us not lift our souls to another.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O God, let us be
A generation that seeks,
Seeks Your face,
O God of Jacob,
O God of Jacob.
